content: Most of the setup for site is done, now we gotta publish!
title: everything set up

content:
This page showcases the typography system used on this site. All values are configurable via data/typography.yaml.
Typography Scale The type scale uses a 1.25 (Major Third) ratio, where each step is 1.25× the previous:
Scale Size Use xs 0.64rem Captions, labels sm 0.8rem Small text, metadata base 1rem Body text md 1.25rem Lead text, h4 lg 1.563rem h3 xl 1.953rem h2 xxl 2.441rem h1 Headings Heading 1 (2.441rem) Heading 2 (1.953rem) Heading 3 (1.563rem) Heading 4 (1.25rem) Heading 5 (1rem) Body Text This is regular body text set in Inter at 18px (1rem) with a line height of 1.618 (the golden ratio). The maximum line width is constrained to 36rem (~65 characters) for optimal readability.
Italic text uses EB Garamond for elegant emphasis. Bold text uses a weight of 600.
Spacing Spacing follows the golden ratio (φ = 1.618):
xs: 0.382rem (6.9px) sm: 0.618rem (11px) base: 1rem (18px) md: 1.618rem (29px) ← golden ratio lg: 2.618rem (47px) ← φ² xl: 4.236rem (76px) ← φ³ Links Internal link to another page External link shows an arrow indicator Code Inline code uses JetBrains Mono.
// Code block example function goldenRatio(n) { const phi = (1 + Math.sqrt(5)) / 2; // 1.618... return n * phi; } Blockquote The golden ratio appears throughout nature, art, and architecture. Using it for typography creates naturally pleasing proportions.
Lists Unordered list:
First item Second item with more text to show how wrapping works Third item Ordered list:
First step Second step Third step Colors The color palette is warm and neutral:
Color Light Dark Background #faf8f5 #1a1816 Text #1a1816 #f0ebe3 Accent #c45a3b #d9735a Edit Configuration To customize, edit data/typography.yaml:
# Change base font size base_font_size: "18px" # Adjust colors colors: light: accent: "#c45a3b"
title: Style Guide
